Part.Source: Event Load Call(ListPrograms, &ProgramNames) For &ProgramName in &ProgramNames &MenuItem = &ProgramName.Description &MenuItem.Link = &ProgramName.Link Load EndFor EndEvent
Event Start //HeaderBC.Object = PageHeader.Create() RecentLinks.Object = RecentLinks.Create("Not Authorized", &Pgmname) Msg('You are not authorized to do this action') Endevent

Part.Source:
Event TabsGrid.Load // Select the subset of tabs that will be shown. Do 'FindTabIndex' Do 'ScrollTabs'
&IsFirstTab = True For &Index = &FirstTab To &LastTab &Tab = &Tabs.Item(&Index) Do 'LoadItem' Load &IsFirstTab = False Endfor
If (&Tabs.Count > 0) &TabBitmap = GetTabImage.Udp(&IsFirstTab, &IsSelectedTab, False, True) EndTab.Bitmap = &TabBitmap Else EndTab.Visible = 0 EndIf EndEvent
Sub 'FindTabIndex' // Searches for the tab with the specified code. // If not found, or code is empty, returns first tab. &Found = False If (&TabCode <> "") For &Index = 1 to &Tabs.Count If (&Tabs.Item(&Index).Code = &TabCode) &SelectedTab = &Index &Found = True Exit EndIf EndFor EndIf
If (not &Found and &Tabs.Count > 0) &SelectedTab = 1 EndIf EndSub
Sub 'ScrollTabs' // Tab scrolling logic (disabled for the moment) &FirstTab = 1 &LastTab = &Tabs.Count TabPrevious.Visible = 0 TabNext.Visible = 0 EndSub
Sub 'LoadItem' Tab.Caption = &Tab.Description If &Index = &SelectedTab &TabBitmap = GetTabImage.udp(&IsFirstTab, True, False, False) &IsSelectedTab = True Tab.Class = !"SelectedTab" Tab.Link = "" &WebComponentUrl = &Tab.WebComponent Component.Object = CreateFromURL(&WebComponentUrl) Else &TabBitmap = GetTabImage.udp(&IsFirstTab, False, &IsSelectedTab, False) &IsSelectedTab = False Tab.Class = !"UnSelectedTab" Tab.Link = &Tab.Link Endif BeginTab.Bitmap = &TabBitmap EndSub

If (&IsLastTab) If (&IsSelected) &Bitmap.FromImage(TabEndSelected) Else &Bitmap.FromImage(TabEndUnselected) Endif Else If (&IsSelected) If (&IsFirstTab) &Bitmap.FromImage(TabBeginSelected) Else &Bitmap.FromImage(TabUnselectedSelected) Endif Else If (&IsFirstTab) &Bitmap.FromImage(TabBeginUnselected) Else If (&IsBeforeTabSelected) &Bitmap.FromImage(TabSelectedUnselected) Else &Bitmap.FromImage(TabUnselectedUnselected) Endif Endif Endif Endif

Part.InnerHtml: Gets the tab image name depending on which tab was selected. Used by the View webpanels.

Part.Source:
//Http POST method &gridParams.start = Val(&request.GetVariable(!'start')) &gridParams.limit = Val(&request.GetVariable(!'limit')) &gridParams.sort = &request.GetVariable(!'sort') &gridParams.dir = &request.GetVariable(!'dir') &gridParams.query = &request.GetVariable(!'query')
&exit = False &i = 0
&gridParams.filterValues = &request.GetVariable("filters")
Do While &exit = False &filter = new() &filter.field = &request.GetVariable("filter[" + trim(str(&i)) + "][field]") If Not &filter.field.IsEmpty() &filter.value = &request.GetVariable("filter[" + trim(str(&i)) + "][data][value]") &filter.type = &request.GetVariable("filter[" + trim(str(&i)) + "][data][type]") &filter.comparison = gxuiFilterComparison.Convert(&request.GetVariable("filter[" + trim(str(&i)) + "][data][comparison]")) &gridParams.filters.Add(&filter) Else &exit = True Endif &i += 1 EndDo

&Authorized = True
/* LoadContext.Call(&Context) If (&GxObject = 'ViewInvoices' and &Context.UserLevel = 0) &Authorized = False Endif */

&Mensagem = 'Origem: ' + &Programa.Trim().ToUpper() &Mensagem += '
' + ' | Err: ' + &ErrN.ToString().Trim() Do Case Case &ErrN = 1 &Mensagem += ' - Duplicate record' Case &ErrN = 101 &Mensagem += ' - End of file' Case &ErrN = 103 &Mensagem += ' - Object locked (record or file)' Case &ErrN = 105 &Mensagem += ' - Object not found' Case &ErrN = 106 &Mensagem += ' - Database already exists' Case &ErrN = 500 &Mensagem += ' - Parent primary key not found' Case &ErrN = 999 &Mensagem += ' - Unexpected DBMS error' OtherWise &Mensagem += ' - Error!!!' EndCase &Mensagem += '
' + ' | Native DBMS Error Code: ' + &gxDBErr.ToString().Trim() + ' - ' + &gxDBTxt.Trim() &Mensagem += ' | Operao: ' + &gxOper.Trim() &Mensagem += '
' + ' | Objeto: ' + &gxErrTbl.Trim() &Mensagem += '
' + ' | Processamento: ' Do Case Case &gxErrOpt = 0 &Mensagem += ' 0 - Continue processing. The error is ignored.' Case &gxErrOpt = 1 &Mensagem += ' 1 - Retry the operation' Case &gxErrOpt = 2 &Mensagem += ' 2 - Cancel application execution' Case &gxErrOpt = 3 &Mensagem += ' 3 - Perform default GeneXus processing' OtherWise &Mensagem += ' ' + &gxErrOpt.ToString().Trim() EndCase
Parm(in:&Programa, in:&ErrN, in:&gxDBErr, in:&gxDBTxt, in:&gxOper, in:&gxErrTbl, in:&gxErrOpt, out:&Mensagem);

Event Start &HPatternLegendCollection.FromXml(&Session.Get(!"Legend"+&Identificador.Trim())) EndEvent
Event Grid1.Load
if &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Type = HPatternLegendType.Button Button1.Class = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Resource Button1.Caption = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Name Button1.Tooltiptext = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Description Button1.Visible = true Image1.Visible = false TextBlock1.Visible = false Else if &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Type = HPatternLegendType.Image Image1.FromURL(&HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Name) Image1.Class = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Resource Image1.Tooltiptext = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Description Button1.Visible = false Image1.Visible = true TextBlock1.Visible = false Else TextBlock1.Class = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Resource TextBlock1.Caption = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Name TextBlock1.Tooltiptext = &HPatternLegendCollection.CurrentItem.Description Button1.Visible = false Image1.Visible = false TextBlock1.Visible = true EndIf EndIf EndEvent
Event 'nada'
EndEvent
